title: The Complete Web Development Bootcamp 2024
subtitle: Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, MongoDB, and more! Build 10+ real-world projects.
description: This comprehensive web development course will take you from absolute beginner to job-ready developer. You'll learn all the essential technologies used in modern web development including HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript ES6+, React, Node.js, Express, MongoDB, and much more. By the end of this course, you'll have built 10+ real-world projects and have a portfolio that will impress employers.
shortDescription: Master web development from scratch with this comprehensive bootcamp. Learn HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Node.js, and build real projects.

instructor.name: Sarah Chen
instructor.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer & Tech Lead
instructor.bio: Sarah is a senior full-stack developer with over 8 years of experience building scalable web applications. She has worked at top tech companies including Google and Microsoft, and has helped over 100,000 students learn web development.

whatYoullLearn: Build responsive websites using HTML5 and CSS3
Master JavaScript ES6+ and modern programming concepts
Create interactive web applications with React
Build RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express
Work with databases using MongoDB and Mongoose
Use Git and GitHub for version control
Apply best practices for code organization and testing
Build a complete portfolio of real-world projects
requirements: No programming experience needed - we'll start from scratch
Willingness to learn and practice regularly
Basic computer skills (opening files, using a web browser)

lectures.title: Introduction to Web Development
lectures.description: Overview of web development and what you'll learn in this course

lectures.title: Setting Up Your Development Environment
lectures.description: Install and configure VS Code, Node.js, and essential tools

lectures.title: How the Web Works
lectures.description: Understanding HTTP, browsers, servers, and the client-server model

lectures.title: HTML Basics and Document Structure
lectures.description: Learn the foundation of HTML and semantic markup

lectures.title: HTML Elements and Attributes
lectures.description: Master all essential HTML elements and their attributes

lectures.title: HTML Forms and Input Types
lectures.description: Create interactive forms with various input types

lectures.title: Semantic HTML and Accessibility
lectures.description: Write accessible and semantic HTML code

lectures.title: CSS Basics and Selectors
lectures.description: Introduction to CSS and how to style HTML elements

lectures.title: CSS Box Model and Layout
lectures.description: Understand the box model and basic layout principles

lectures.title: Flexbox Layout
lectures.description: Master modern CSS layout with Flexbox

lectures.title: CSS Grid Layout
lectures.description: Create complex layouts with CSS Grid

lectures.title: Responsive Design and Media Queries
lectures.description: Make your websites work on all devices

reviews.title: Excellent course for beginners!
reviews.content: This course is absolutely fantastic! Sarah explains everything so clearly and the projects are really practical. I went from knowing nothing about web development to building my own portfolio website. Highly recommended!

reviews.title: Best web development course I've taken
reviews.content: The curriculum is well-structured and the instructor is amazing. I love how she breaks down complex concepts into simple, understandable parts. The real-world projects really help solidify the learning.

reviews.title: Great content, could use more advanced topics
reviews.content: The course covers all the basics really well. I wish there was more content on advanced React patterns and performance optimization, but overall it's a solid foundation course.

frequentlyBoughtTogether.title: React Complete Guide with Hooks and Redux
